text:
The problem is most likely that you have moved the batik-rasterizer
jar file away from it's associated 'lib' directory.  You need
to maintain the release directory structure or else manually
add all of the 'sub jars' to your classpath (they are
referenced by batik-rasterizer in it's manifest).
